title: Commission Directive 91/127/EEC of 14 February 1991 amending Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes
header:
COMMISSION DIRECTIVE  of 14 February 1991  amending Directive 66/403/EEC on the marketing of seed potatoes  (91/127/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 15 (2a) of Directive 66/403/EEC, '31 March 1990' is replaced by '31 March 1991'.

Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive.
When Member States adopt these measures, these shall contain a reference to this Directive or shall be accompanied by such reference on the occasion of their official publication. The procedure for such reference shall be adopted by Member States.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 February 1991.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2320/66.
(2) OJ No L 353, 17. 12. 1990, p. 48.
(3) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
(4) OJ No L 344, 25. 11. 1989, p. 31.
(5) OJ No L 328, 28. 11. 1990, p. 20.
